hosp2home.info: Zeitraum der notwendigen Hospitalisierung eines Patienten, der ohne Intensivpflege wieder gesundet

home2hosp.label: home2hosp
home2hosp.info: Mean time a patient with mild symptoms spends at home before hospital admission due to worsening of the disease condition.

hosp2icu.label: hosp2icu
hosp2icu.info: Mean time a patient who entered the hospital will be hospitalized without ICU before being connected to an ICU.

icu2home.label: icu2home
icu2home.info: Mean time a patient is connected to an ICU before returning home.

infasy.label: infasy
infasy.info: Mean time an asymptomatic person remains infective.

icu2death.label: icu2death
icu2death.info: Mean time a person needs ICU support before dying.

beta.label: beta
beta.info: Risk of infection from the infected symptomatic patients.
